education_text.0: From 1995 to 1997 he worked at the Sydney University, followed by a position as a senior lecturer at      Monash University Monash University and, from 2001, a post as an associate professor at the      University of Southern Denmark University of Southern DenmarkFrom 1995 to 1997 he worked at the Sydney University, followed by a position as a senior lecturer at      Monash University Monash University and, from 2001, a post as an associate professor at the      University of Southern Denmark University of Southern DenmarkFrom 1995 to 1997 he worked at the Sydney University, followed by a position as a senior lecturer at      Monash University Monash University and, from 2001, a post as an associate professor at the      University of Southern Denmark University of Southern Denmark
